# Lose Face - An open source face recognition project
# Copyright (C) 2008-2009 David Capello
# All rights reserved.

project(clapack)

include(CheckCSourceCompiles)

check_c_source_compiles("
  #include <unistd.h>
  int main(void)
  {
    return 0;
  }"
  HAVE_UNISTD_H)

set(f2c_flags)

if(WIN32)
  set(f2c_flags "${f2c_flags} -DWINDOWS -DUSE_CLOCK")
endif(WIN32)

if(UNIX)
  set(f2c_flags "${f2c_flags} -DLINUX")
endif(UNIX)

if(NOT HAVE_UNISTD_H)
  set(f2c_flags "${f2c_flags} -DNO_TRUNCATE -DNON_POSIX_STDIO")
endif(NOT HAVE_UNISTD_H)

######################################################################
# F2CLIB
######################################################################

set(F2C_MISC
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/f77vers.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i77vers.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/s_rnge.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/abort_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/exit_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/getarg_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/iargc_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/getenv_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/signal_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/s_stop.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/s_paus.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/system_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/cabs.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/derf_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/derfc_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/erf_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/erfc_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/sig_die.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/uninit.c)

set(F2C_POW
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/pow_ci.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/pow_dd.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/pow_di.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/pow_hh.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/pow_ii.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/pow_ri.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/pow_zi.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/pow_zz.c)

set(F2C_CX
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/c_abs.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/c_cos.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/c_div.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/c_exp.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/c_log.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/c_sin.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/c_sqrt.c)

set(F2C_DCX
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/z_abs.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/z_cos.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/z_div.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/z_exp.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/z_log.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/z_sin.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/z_sqrt.c)

set(F2C_REAL
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_abs.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_acos.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_asin.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_atan.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_atn2.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_cnjg.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_cos.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_cosh.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_dim.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_exp.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_imag.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_int.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_lg10.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_log.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_mod.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_nint.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_sign.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_sin.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_sinh.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_sqrt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_tan.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/r_tanh.c)

set(F2C_DBL
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_abs.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_acos.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_asin.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_atan.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_atn2.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_cnjg.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_cos.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_cosh.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_dim.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_exp.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_imag.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_int.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_lg10.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_log.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_mod.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_nint.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_prod.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_sign.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_sin.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_sinh.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_sqrt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_tan.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/d_tanh.c)

set(F2C_INT
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i_abs.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i_dim.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i_dnnt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i_indx.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i_len.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i_mod.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i_nint.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/i_sign.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/lbitbits.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/lbitshft.c)

set(F2C_HALF
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/h_abs.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/h_dim.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/h_dnnt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/h_indx.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/h_len.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/h_mod.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/h_nint.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/h_sign.c)

set(F2C_CMP
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/l_ge.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/l_gt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/l_le.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/l_lt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/hl_ge.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/hl_gt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/hl_le.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/hl_lt.c)

set(F2C_EFL
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/ef1asc_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/ef1cmc_.c)

set(F2C_CHAR
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/f77_aloc.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/s_cat.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/s_cmp.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/s_copy.c)

set(F2C_I77
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/backspac.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/close.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/dfe.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/dolio.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/due.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/endfile.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/err.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/fmt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/fmtlib.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/ftell_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/iio.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/ilnw.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/inquire.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/lread.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/lwrite.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/open.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/rdfmt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/rewind.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/rsfe.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/rsli.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/rsne.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/sfe.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/sue.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/typesize.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/uio.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/util.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/wref.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/wrtfmt.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/wsfe.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/wsle.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/wsne.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/xwsne.c)

set(F2C_TIME
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/dtime_.c
  F2CLIBS/libf2c/etime_.c)

add_library(f2c
  ${F2C_MISC} ${F2C_POW} ${F2C_CX} ${F2C_DCX} ${F2C_REAL} 
  ${F2C_DBL} ${F2C_INT} ${F2C_HALF} ${F2C_CMP} ${F2C_EFL}
  ${F2C_CHAR} ${F2C_I77} ${F2C_TIME})

set_target_properties(f2c PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS ${f2c_flags})

######################################################################
# BLAS
######################################################################

# Level 1

set(SBLAS1 
  BLAS/SRC/isamax.c
  BLAS/SRC/sasum.c
  BLAS/SRC/saxpy.c
  BLAS/SRC/scopy.c
  BLAS/SRC/sdot.c
  BLAS/SRC/snrm2.c
  BLAS/SRC/srot.c
  BLAS/SRC/srotg.c
  BLAS/SRC/sscal.c
  BLAS/SRC/sswap.c
  BLAS/SRC/sdsdot.c
  BLAS/SRC/srotmg.c
  BLAS/SRC/srotm.c)

set(CBLAS1
  BLAS/SRC/scabs1.c
  BLAS/SRC/scasum.c
  BLAS/SRC/scnrm2.c
  BLAS/SRC/icamax.c
  BLAS/SRC/caxpy.c
  BLAS/SRC/ccopy.c
  BLAS/SRC/cdotc.c
  BLAS/SRC/cdotu.c
  BLAS/SRC/csscal.c
  BLAS/SRC/crotg.c
  BLAS/SRC/cscal.c
  BLAS/SRC/cswap.c
  BLAS/SRC/csrot.c)

set(DBLAS1
  BLAS/SRC/idamax.c
  BLAS/SRC/dasum.c
  BLAS/SRC/daxpy.c
  BLAS/SRC/dcopy.c
  BLAS/SRC/ddot.c
  BLAS/SRC/dnrm2.c
  BLAS/SRC/drot.c
  BLAS/SRC/drotg.c
  BLAS/SRC/dscal.c
  BLAS/SRC/dswap.c
  BLAS/SRC/drotmg.c
  BLAS/SRC/drotm.c)

set(ZBLAS1
  BLAS/SRC/dcabs1.c
  BLAS/SRC/dzasum.c
  BLAS/SRC/dznrm2.c
  BLAS/SRC/izamax.c
  BLAS/SRC/zaxpy.c
  BLAS/SRC/zcopy.c
  BLAS/SRC/zdotc.c
  BLAS/SRC/zdotu.c
  BLAS/SRC/zdscal.c
  BLAS/SRC/zrotg.c
  BLAS/SRC/zscal.c
  BLAS/SRC/zswap.c
  BLAS/SRC/zdrot.c)

set(CB1AUX
  BLAS/SRC/isamax.c
  BLAS/SRC/sasum.c
  BLAS/SRC/saxpy.c
  BLAS/SRC/scopy.c
  BLAS/SRC/snrm2.c
  BLAS/SRC/sscal.c)

set(ZB1AUX
  BLAS/SRC/idamax.c
  BLAS/SRC/dasum.c
  BLAS/SRC/daxpy.c
  BLAS/SRC/dcopy.c
  BLAS/SRC/dnrm2.c
  BLAS/SRC/dscal.c)

# Aux for Level 2 and 3

set(ALLBLAS
  BLAS/SRC/lsame.c
  BLAS/SRC/xerbla.c)

# Level 2

set(SBLAS2
  BLAS/SRC/sgemv.c
  BLAS/SRC/sgbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ssymv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ssbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/sspmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/strmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/stbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/stpmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/strsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/stbsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/stpsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/sger.c
  BLAS/SRC/ssyr.c
  BLAS/SRC/sspr.c
  BLAS/SRC/ssyr2.c
  BLAS/SRC/sspr2.c)

set(CBLAS2
  BLAS/SRC/cgemv.c
  BLAS/SRC/cgbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/chemv.c
  BLAS/SRC/chbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/chpmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ctrmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ctbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ctpmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ctrsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ctbsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ctpsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/cgerc.c
  BLAS/SRC/cgeru.c
  BLAS/SRC/cher.c
  BLAS/SRC/chpr.c
  BLAS/SRC/cher2.c
  BLAS/SRC/chpr2.c)

set(DBLAS2
  BLAS/SRC/dgemv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dgbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dsymv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dsbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dspmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dtrmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dtbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dtpmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dtrsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dtbsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dtpsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/dger.c
  BLAS/SRC/dsyr.c
  BLAS/SRC/dspr.c
  BLAS/SRC/dsyr2.c
  BLAS/SRC/dspr2.c)

set(ZBLAS2
  BLAS/SRC/zgemv.c
  BLAS/SRC/zgbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/zhemv.c
  BLAS/SRC/zhbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/zhpmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ztrmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ztbmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ztpmv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ztrsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ztbsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/ztpsv.c
  BLAS/SRC/zgerc.c
  BLAS/SRC/zgeru.c
  BLAS/SRC/zher.c
  BLAS/SRC/zhpr.c
  BLAS/SRC/zher2.c
  BLAS/SRC/zhpr2.c)

# Level 3

set(SBLAS3
  BLAS/SRC/sgemm.c
  BLAS/SRC/ssymm.c
  BLAS/SRC/ssyrk.c
  BLAS/SRC/ssyr2k.c
  BLAS/SRC/strmm.c
  BLAS/SRC/strsm.c)

set(CBLAS3
  BLAS/SRC/cgemm.c
  BLAS/SRC/csymm.c
  BLAS/SRC/csyrk.c
  BLAS/SRC/csyr2k.c
  BLAS/SRC/ctrmm.c
  BLAS/SRC/ctrsm.c
  BLAS/SRC/chemm.c
  BLAS/SRC/cherk.c
  BLAS/SRC/cher2k.c)

set(DBLAS3
  BLAS/SRC/dgemm.c
  BLAS/SRC/dsymm.c
  BLAS/SRC/dsyrk.c
  BLAS/SRC/dsyr2k.c
  BLAS/SRC/dtrmm.c
  BLAS/SRC/dtrsm.c)

set(ZBLAS3
  BLAS/SRC/zgemm.c
  BLAS/SRC/zsymm.c
  BLAS/SRC/zsyrk.c
  BLAS/SRC/zsyr2k.c
  BLAS/SRC/ztrmm.c
  BLAS/SRC/ztrsm.c
  BLAS/SRC/zhemm.c
  BLAS/SRC/zherk.c
  BLAS/SRC/zher2k.c)

# add_library(blas
#   ${SBLAS1} ${SBLAS2} ${SBLAS3} ${DBLAS1} ${DBLAS2} ${DBLAS3}
#   ${CBLAS1} ${CB1AUX} ${CBLAS2} ${CBLAS3} ${ZBLAS1} ${ZB1AUX}
#   ${ZBLAS2} ${ZBLAS3} ${ALLBLAS})

# add_library(blas-single ${SBLAS1} ${SBLAS2} ${SBLAS3} ${ALLBLAS})
add_library(blas-double ${DBLAS1} ${DBLAS2} ${DBLAS3} ${ALLBLAS})
# add_library(blas-complex ${CBLAS1} ${CBLAS2} ${CBLAS3} ${CB1AUX} ${ALLBLAS})
# add_library(blas-complex16 ${ZBLAS1} ${ZBLAS2} ${ZBLAS3} ${ZB1AUX} ${ALLBLAS})

######################################################################
# BLASWRAP
######################################################################

set(BLASWRAP_SOURCES
  BLAS/WRAP/cblaswr.c
  BLAS/WRAP/crotg.c
  BLAS/WRAP/zrotg.c)

add_library(blaswrap ${BLASWRAP_SOURCES})
